video_prompt: A powerful anime-style female character runs in a high-speed pursuit through a futuristic city. Her silver-white hair flows behind her as fiery orange-red flames trail from her feet, leaving embers. Pink-purple electrical energy arcs swirl around her and extend dramatically, emanating from her and her glowing staff. She sprints upwards on a rising crystalline path. Behind her, a male character urgently runs, his gaze fixed forward. In the bustling background, vibrant pink-purple laser beams crisscross between glowing skyscrapers.
image_prompt: Dynamic anime-style scene, low-angle perspective, high-stakes pursuit or escape. A powerful female character with long flowing silver-white hair and glowing red eyes, wearing a sharp black business suit (with a subtle '8' emblem) and black choker, runs intensely. Her feet are engulfed in fiery orange-red flames leaving a trail, while vibrant pink-purple electrical arcs surge around her. She wields a glowing pink-purple ornate gold staff resembling an eye or winged compass. She runs on an extraordinary, rising path of sharply faceted blue crystals. Behind her, a dark-skinned, bearded man in a dark suit runs urgently on a grey bridge. The background features a bustling futuristic cityscape under a bright blue sky, with glowing skyscrapers, a massive suspension bridge, and crisscrossing pink-purple energy beams. Vivid and energetic color palette of cool blues, intense reds, and vibrant pink-purple effects.
refined_video_prompt: A female character sprints in a high-speed pursuit. Her hair flows dynamically as fiery flames trail from her feet, leaving dissipating embers. Electrical energy arcs swirl and extend powerfully from her and her staff. She rapidly ascends a continuously rising path. Behind her, a male character urgently runs, his gaze intensely fixed forward. In the bustling background, laser beams actively crisscross between the towering structures.
